Subject:   Permission for Carriage of Arms & Ammunition by the   
                 General Manager,  Field Gun Factory, Kalpi Road, Kanpur. 
 
 
 
 
A copy of DGCA permit  number 39-AA/2011, issued under 
reference  No.8/70/2008-IR, dated 24.01.2011,  regarding authorization to 
the General Manager, Field Gun Factory, Kalpi Road, Kanpur-208009 for 
carriage of arms & ammunition, consigned to the licensed dealers by air 
within the territory of India, is forwarded herewith for information and 
necessary action by all concerned.   
 
2. 
Unless suspended or revoked earlier, this permit shall remain 
valid till 31.12.2011  from the date of issue.  
 
 
   This issue with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).
